Summary: Hovering object in sky over downtown Atlanta. Object was about 20feet wide.
divs: sighting detailswe posted our account on reddit. direct link: [link moved to fi section\cms\tg] 1. we were on the 15th floor of a high rise building in atlanta. we were working. 2. we were looking out the window and it was significantly above a 200ft ferris wheel. 3. various accounts in the office: a kite, a stealth bomber, a drone, an airplane & a weather balloon. 4. it hovered mostly stationary with occasional changes in elevation. 5. curious. 6. went to upload the video we just took and it was gone. multiple witnesses posted their experience on reddit. (link above)
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around July 24th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
